channel.title: Riis on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Riis on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Docker Detroit, Wednesday July 22, 2015, 6:00 pm, Troy, Michigan
item.description: I hope to see you at Docker Detroit’s kickoff meeting, to be held at RIIS, 1250 Stephenson Highway, Suite 200 in Troy, MI starting at 6:00 p.m. tonight July 22 2015. I’ll be coming in from Ann Arbor. The venue is between 14 Mile and Maple behind Beaumont Hospital. Google Maps suggests that because of construction on I-75 in that area you might want to head north on Campbell instead of taking the I-75 / I-696 interchange north.
